website_summaries.verdict: Cleans up thoroughly and safely, thanks to stainless steel design.
pros: Two-sided mallet design includes a flat side and a textured side
Owners say weight of the mallet simplifies any tenderizing task
cons: Customers report bits of meat sticking inside metal seam

customer_reviews.title: NOT solid stainless head
customer_reviews.text: Although this hammer is stainless steel, it is NOT a solid stainless steel head but rather a 3 piece stamped stainless steel head that’s weighted with something that rattles around on the inside. The issue with this design is that there are gaps in the hammer head that meat/liquids get into and can pose a sanitation hazard. Poor design, in my opinion. After further research, it appears that Cave Tools is Re-branding a mass produced cheap design and throwing a silicone sleeve on the handle. Disappointing. I would not have purchased this product if I paid more attention to the design.
customer_reviews.author: Aleks

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Great weight to use. Too bad the band around the head is not tighter. Concerned about contamination, I have to sterilize after every use by boiling the head. Keep getting food stuck in the collar.
customer_reviews.author: Janice Wendt

customer_reviews.title: OK but not ergonomic enough
customer_reviews.text: This is great quality just as it says. However, had to give it 3 stars for several substantive reasons: The handle is clearly not long enough to be superior not is its circumference adequate. When testing it - bc handle is not long enough --- the "U" hook at the end dug into the hand causing considerable discomfort & a bit of bruise. Not quite ergonomic enough also. A good design can be great with a more length, a wider grip (handle circumference) & ALSO -- make the prongs/rivets protrude (stick out) considerably more. That would make it superior vs ok.
customer_reviews.author: OHT

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality and Affordable Tool
customer_reviews.text: This is a good tool to have in your kitchen. For Stainless Steel, it's a great price! Make sure you use a cutting board underneath so you don't damage your countertop. Features: 1. Has a good grip from the rubber handle that doesn't slip 2. Balanced weight - not too heavy, not too light 3. Good quality - it lasts a long time as long as you take care of it 4. Easy to clean 5. Two sides --The bumpy side is great for tougher meats and to break down fat, tissue, muscle --The flat side is good for lean meats like boneless chicken
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: this is great! much easier on my hands
customer_reviews.text: The mallet is really easy to hold, doesn't slip. And packs a powerful wallop! I hate to admit I've been using my wood rolling pin for many years to flatten and tenderize chicken breast and meat. My hand lost some strength in clutching so I thought I'd try this, and I am amazed how much easier and even faster this is and no strain on my hands at all. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: JetBay

customer_reviews.title: Pound away!
customer_reviews.text: I had some doubts ordering a tenderizer or (any kitchen utensil) on line. In my experience they usually are subpar, flimsy or fall apart easily. This is NOT the case here. This is well made, solid and it has a bit of heft to it. Honestly much better than my old store bought tenderizer that somehow vanished in our last move. The grip had a thicker rubber feel to it, don’t slide out of your hand and the metal part is well made and a solid piece. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: TheTattooedMom

customer_reviews.title: Works Perfectly for my use.
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a meat tenderizer for a while. I viewed several that we made of varying materials which seemed to corrode with time. I ran across this stainless steel tenderizer and thought this might be the one I was looking for at a reasonable price. I have not been disappointed. It works perfectly, cleans quickly and is ready for the next job. I do tend to place items to be tenderized or flattened in a plastic freezer bag prior to pounding so that I don't splatter material all over the counter which makes cleanup a painless job. Overall, very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Tobin

customer_reviews.title: Defective Poor manufacturing
customer_reviews.text: This meat mallet tool is defective. The head is held by a cylinder. The smooth side was recessed into the holder. This will not allow pounding meat but would result in cutting it. The cylinder will make cleaning this item nearly impossible. This item is listed as "NON RETURNABLE" so I can't even get my money back.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher J. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Excellent mallet, staple kitchen tool
customer_reviews.text: My family loves this mallet. I'm definitely glad that I spend a few extra bucks on it rather than cheaping out on one of the low-quality ones. It's heavy, so it takes very little effort to use, and mine has been through the dishwasher a few times without a problem. I just recommend being careful with the seam on one end because meat can get stuck in it if you're not careful. I always soak it in bleach for a few minutes before putting it in the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Better than I expected - great quality mallet
customer_reviews.text: Product was shipped quickly and arrived in perfect condition. I have used it twice already - once on chicken breasts and once on round steak. The mallet is solid and of excellent quality. The weight of the mallet is not too heavy, but heavy enough to make easy work of tenderizing the meat. You don't need to put any muscle into it - the weight of the mallet is perfect and does all the work for you. I would recommend this to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Eden

customer_reviews.title: Head of mallet has sharp edges
customer_reviews.text: Do Not buy. Poorly made and unable to return. Head of mallet is not solid. The handle is attached to the head with a wrap around piece of metal that has sharp unfinished edges around each side of the mallet surfaces that will cut you if not careful when washing by hand.
customer_reviews.author: W. Albert

customer_reviews.title: This Mallet is a Hit!!!
customer_reviews.text: Such a fantastic tool. You can see a lot of thought was put in making this the ideal meat mallet, as they have insured the weight is appropriately distributed and the stainless steel makes it easy to clean and will be long lasting. I used this to flatten some chicken and it didn't any effort to do so . I will be using this on a regular basis because there is such a big difference in how the seasonings infiltrate the meat after using it, the chicken was much more flavorful. Highly recommended and a super purchase.
customer_reviews.author: P. Allen

customer_reviews.title: Great Price Well Made
customer_reviews.text: About 5 months ago we committed to a healthier lifestyle. A big part of that life style was cooking!!! So I find myself making a lot of stuffed chicken. I had a wooden mallet for years which i did not use often until our healthy eating regimen began. I just threw the wooden one out and I love this new one!! It’s well built, very sturdy, and dishwasher safe!! Also, it was much cheaper than one I priced at Target! It was a great price for a well made tool!
customer_reviews.author: Angie Bark

customer_reviews.title: The Right One !!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a amateur self taught chef . This mallet is the real deal. I had several different types a now I have the best. Loved it so much my wife wanted one as a gift for her friend's wedding shower.👨‍🍳👍🏻 If your looking for a mallet you just found the right one.!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jerry G

customer_reviews.title: this mallet is absolutely great! Right weight and balance for a kitchen mallet
customer_reviews.text: OK, this mallet is absolutely great! Right weight and balance for a kitchen mallet. None of those round disc's with a vertical handle for me! the hammer/mallet configuration lends itself to a 'natural' pounding motion that all are familiar with. The silicone handle cover seems fine and there are no issues IMHO with flaking/peeling. The nubs on the one side of the mallet are great for slippery surfaces (chicken breasts, etc.) and don't trash the flesh while in the process of flattening the material. The quality and finish of the mallet is first-rate. Finally, I love the fact that you can toss it (carefully) into the dishwasher!
customer_reviews.author: MzB

customer_reviews.title: Will need to exchange due to rattle in head.
customer_reviews.text: Let me start with I like the idea of this mallet i.e. stainless steel, dishwasher safe. It arrived with scratches on the smooth surface and the head has loose parts in it that rattle. I expected the head to be a solid piece, as most mallets are. This one appears to be SS ends with some type of weight added in the center. Am not sure how this will hold up over time. Will be exchanging, as I rank dishwasher safe as a top priority in kitchen utensils and this tool still has overwhelming positive reviews.
customer_reviews.author: MEK

customer_reviews.title: Perfect tenderizer
customer_reviews.text: This meat tenderizer replaced a wooden one that kept flying off the handle. My old one took a very long time to tenderize the meat, in between me putting the head back on, but not this one. It takes very little effort to use and I like that its dishwasher safe! It does take a couple times to get used to how to properly use this tenderizer. The first couple of times I used it I smashed the meat and made it split. But that was my fault from using a crappy wooden one that took a lot of force to use.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made; not returnable
customer_reviews.text: This is flimsy and poorly balanced. It makes a noise when I move it (like there are pebbles in the head of the hammer). It's not returnable due to the seller's policy. I'm buying a replacement and trashing this one. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Dishwasher safe!
customer_reviews.text: Nice weight to it, easy to grip, and easy to clean, wish I had found this earlier instead of wasting time and money on cheap aluminum ones.
customer_reviews.author: Desmo

customer_reviews.title: Not worth buying
customer_reviews.text: This mallet is worth less than half the price retail. It feels very cheap and it's basically sheet metal glued together with a weight in the head. I wish I didn't believe all the good reviews and paid closer attention to the photos. 2 stars and not 1 because I should have noticed the seams in the photos. Also the rubber on the handle slides right off. The head is not seamless so food will get stuck INSIDE THE MALLET. I will probably throw this out and buy another mallet. If I can't return it. A shame because of the high price.
customer_reviews.author: Aslan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for veal cutlets.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent mallet. I was worried that the rounded points wouldn't be sharp enough to do the job but it worked very well on veal cutlets. I wish someone would sell a stainless mallet with deeper sharper points for thicker meats, like chicken breasts and pork loin. I haven't used this on them yet and will update the review if it doesn't work well enough for them.
customer_reviews.author: B. Healthy

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty - substantially constructed
customer_reviews.text: Great size and construction, I like the way it feels in my hand. I also like the rust free aspect, but I haven't had it long enough to decide.
customer_reviews.author: mark woeppel

customer_reviews.title: Dull spiked end
customer_reviews.text: Excellent weight and rubber handle for easy gripping, depending on who you talk to the spiked end are dull knobby and not meant to be sharp, then why have them since the flat end will accomplish the same
customer_reviews.author: M. Johns

customer_reviews.title: This is absolutely the best meat mallet I have ever owned
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely the best meat mallet I have ever owned. I love that it is stainless steel (looks great and cleans beautifully!). The weight is perfect and takes very little effort; reducing the stress on my wrist. I use this on a regular basis, mostly with chicken breast getting it to an even thickness so that it will grill evenly. After using it one time, I gathered up my old mallets and threw them away. I highly recommend this product and will be buying a few to give as gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Carol W

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful shiny stainless steel product
customer_reviews.text: Love this Mallet. You can tenderize meat, flaten cookies, crack or smash nuts, and many other uses. It's like a hammer for the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Tenderized our meats. ;)
customer_reviews.text: My husband has kept mentioning how we needed a tenderizer for our steaks and thicker chicken breasts, so I finally just pulled up Amazon and searched while he prepared the steaks. I bought this due to reviews, and have been very happy! It is great quality, size, weight, and has definitely done the job. Pleased with the purchase and the quality control from Cave Tools. Seem to have great customer service, too!
customer_reviews.author: larissa

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tool
customer_reviews.text: This kitchen tool works great. Its cleans up easy. Much nicer than my cheap one I had.
customer_reviews.author: Dale Lerback

customer_reviews.title: Best Choice for Meat Tenderizing
customer_reviews.text: Tool is well made & feels terrific in the hand. I looked at a lot of tenderizers & am very happy with this one. I love pork tenderloins & this works great without being a danger to use (no sharp points.) The stainless steel finish is a real plus.
customer_reviews.author: Jo-Lynn Mull

customer_reviews.title: Cheapest stainless steel version I could find of decent quality
customer_reviews.text: 5 stars because it's the best in its price range, no doubt. Stainless steel instead of all the aluminum ones in this price range. Good heft to it. Polished. Feels like it'll stand up to punishment. Plus the grippy handle is nice.
customer_reviews.author: dirty_ketchup

customer_reviews.title: This is one of the greatest little tools I have ever had in my kitchen
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the greatest little tools I have ever had in my kitchen. I not only use it to tenderize my meat but I also use it to chop up my nuts for baking. It will whack just about anything up that needs whacked. Love it for making chicken fillets.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley B.

customer_reviews.title: good weight, good stainless platiing and good ergonomic feel ...
customer_reviews.text: Well constructed, good weight, good stainless platiing and good ergonomic feel but not tenderizing side of mallet "spikes" not raised or pointed (sharp) enough/ This would make an excellent abalone mallet.
customer_reviews.author: coastrat

customer_reviews.title: GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! I have had this thing a few months and I love it. We recently moved to Germany and I'm learning to make schnitzel. I wrap the chicken or pork in saran wrap first and then use the pointy side to beat it. Then the flat side. It works great with minimal effort and with the plastic wrap it doesn't splatter a mess everywhere!
customer_reviews.author: loreleigal

customer_reviews.title: Beats Meat - Good
customer_reviews.text: Yea its good, does the trick. Now my chicken cutlets are nice
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Chadwick

customer_reviews.title: Heavy, stainless steel, dishwasher-safe. love it.
customer_reviews.text: It took me a while to actually use this, but I'm glad I bought it. It's clad in stainless steel, substantial, no weird angles to clean, and dishwasher-safe. Even the side with the points has conical points, so, much better than any meat tenderizer I've had in heft, store-ability and ease of clean up. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: janutchka

customer_reviews.title: Dents Scratches and Ringing Noise
customer_reviews.text: It came with noticeable dents and scratches. It also makes this unbearable rattling noise when I use it. It sounds like I bought jingle bells. I really wanted to like this product.
customer_reviews.author: Michael John Francis

customer_reviews.title: Stainless steel and dishwasher safe
customer_reviews.text: This meat tenderizer/pounder is great! I used it to pound chicken breasts to make crab stuffed breasts. It is the perfect size and weight. I especially like and appreciate that it is dishwasher safe. I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Baby Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Design and Style
customer_reviews.text: “Excellent design and with the Stainless Steel structure in makes it dishwasher safe NOT like the last one I purchased and had to toss in the trash after the first use. My wife LOVES it and will use it at every opportunity in our kitchen. Well worth the money with a life-time warranty !!"
customer_reviews.author: Joseph S. Wolfson Sr.

customer_reviews.title: Great Meat Mallet...
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived as promised in 2 days. I am very impressed with this meat mallet. It is pretty heavy at the head but feels very comfortable in the hand. I just know it will get the job done with little effort. I love the fact that it is stainless steel. Thanks for adding the free downloadable Barbecue Recipe Book! :-)
customer_reviews.author: Barb H

customer_reviews.title: A must have...(at least for the foodie)
customer_reviews.text: In the past I have had passable meat tenderizer tools. I thought they did the job until I used this mallet. My diet is primarily chicken in the meat category so I wanted a tool that had some finesse so as not to pulverize a chicken breast. This is perfect and a pleasure to use....great ergonomics and design.
customer_reviews.author: reviewer in Florida

customer_reviews.title: Nice.
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be an excellent tool for the kitchen. We'll see how it holds up with the test of time.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth W.

customer_reviews.title: Drop the hammer!
customer_reviews.text: This thing really drops the hammer on meat. Tenderizes whatever you hit. The weight is balanced in the head perfectly. Seriously slightly elevating the head and allowing it to fall on the meat does the trick. This is a winner, plus stainless, plus lifetime guarantee, better get one.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use! Being dishwasher safe made me select it and I am very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Susan M Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: The best meat tenderizer mallet on the market.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best tenderizer mallet on the market. It is heavy duty and just feels right. It doesn't shred the meat, but instead "rolls it out. I am going to buy several more of these for Christmas presents next year.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy W

customer_reviews.title: NO MORE DISCOLORATION
customer_reviews.text: I have gone through so many of these meat mallets, only to have them discolor over time. I finally realized that it was because I was putting them through the dishwasher when they weren't stainless steel. I'm hoping that this is the last one I ever buy! Works great.
customer_reviews.author: Taunya R.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: My very favorite tenderizer. It's got a nice weight to it and is easy to clean. It also looks nice, meaning more expensive than most, so would be a nice add in for a wedding or birthday gift.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene

customer_reviews.title: The build quality and finish on this mallet is awesome. I think they used some Dwarven steel to ...
customer_reviews.text: The build quality and finish on this mallet is awesome. I think they used some Dwarven steel to make it. Use it mostly for thinning out chicken and it always makes short work of it. Use the tenderizer on occasion when I spoil myself with some red meat and a couple of flagons of mead. Also love the fact that I can just throw this in the washing machine when I'm done with.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Just Right
customer_reviews.text: Great meat mallet! I love that the pointy side does not tear the meat up but still does the job of tenderizing while flattening the meat. The mallet is heavy enough to work perfectly and, paradoxically, also easy to use. It is a very nice design with durable construction.
customer_reviews.author: Kiki Overstreet

customer_reviews.title: but after having used it for several months it's great. The size is a result of the very ...
customer_reviews.text: Was a bit concerned at how small it was compared to my previous tenderizer, but after having used it for several months it's great. The size is a result of the very heavy head and general balance. Works better than any I've used before and saves space to boot.
customer_reviews.author: Richard S. Ballantyne

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for a cook
customer_reviews.text: Husband loves it! Heavy and perfect for tenderizing steaks and chicken.
customer_reviews.author: Michele P

customer_reviews.title: Great Mallet!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this Cave Tools meat Mallet for a year and a half now and it's one of my favorite kitchen utensils. It looks great and feels great in your hand. It's perfect for pounding pork cutlets flat to make snitzel. Built to last forever.
customer_reviews.author: Joe M

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use & clean
customer_reviews.text: Awesome meat tenderizer! I've had many different types of tenderizers in the past, but have always found them very difficult to clean. This one cleans very easy (none of the meat gets stuck in the grooves) and works great.
customer_reviews.author: AbbyC

customer_reviews.title: just like it's suppose to
customer_reviews.text: There isn't much you can say about a mallet tool. It's a heavy hammer that crushes meat very well. It has a broad head that doesn't cut the meat, but rather crushes it, just like it's suppose to. It's clean looking and easy to clean after use.
customer_reviews.author: K. Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Decent but not for cube steak
customer_reviews.text: Decent but the cubesteak pointy side is so shallow might as well be flat on both sides.
customer_reviews.author: dudezer

customer_reviews.title: It's a hammer!
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Sturdy design. Meat is tenderized well with the metal spikes.
customer_reviews.author: ChinchillasRule

customer_reviews.title: great quality
customer_reviews.text: great quality and very easy to use. the metal part is very sturdy. It also came with meat recipe which is a plus!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This meat tenderizer is very good quality. It is easy to hold and the ...
customer_reviews.text: This meat tenderizer is very good quality. It is easy to hold and the handle is comfortable when pounding the meat. The two sides allow you to either tenderize the meat or pound it depending on your recipe. It is heavy so it does most of the work. It is great that it is dishwasher safe, so easy clean up.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Pounds your meat
customer_reviews.text: Does what it says. Made of stainless steel and nice firm rubber grip. As other have said, the toothed side is not sharp or deep. Try something else if you need that...
customer_reviews.author: furd

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: This product is solid and works well. I wouldn't hesitate to buy another one if I needed it. The "free book" that was offered was an e-book, a little PDF file you download. I was expecting an actual book. That is why it got 4 stars and not 5
customer_reviews.author: N. Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Does not roll out meat well at all.
customer_reviews.text: Liked mallets. Rolling part does not roll out to thin meat well. Would be better if it actually rolled I think.
customer_reviews.author: Carlene Fickes

customer_reviews.title: It's nice to be able to get a tool that is ...
customer_reviews.text: I replaced my old can-only-wash-by-hand wooden one for this dishwasher safe version. It's nice to be able to get a tool that is touching meat really clean.
customer_reviews.author: JBu

customer_reviews.title: A pleasant surprise
customer_reviews.text: I have used it only once, but was so happy to have it and to get the results I wanted! My other meat mallet broke over a year ago, and the replacements I found were too small and light weight. I use a mallet primarily for flattening chicken breasts, so the thickness is even and they cook more evenly. And that's exactly the result I got! Yay!
customer_reviews.author: drbrr

customer_reviews.title: It's wonderful to have the right tool for the job
customer_reviews.text: I gave this as a gift for Christmas, and when I saw how well made it was I had to have one for myself. It's wonderful to have the right tool for the job. Works great. Also works great if you need to get out a little aggression!!!
customer_reviews.author: ECasper

customer_reviews.title: We love this tenderizer
customer_reviews.text: We love this tenderizer. It's used to pound chicken for various recipes we prepare. Nicely weighted and cleans in the dishwasher! A plus for us.
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: teeth are pointless
customer_reviews.text: Its very heavy which is nice but the teeth are very short and more rounded than i would prefer. they dont really work. I guess i can get by with this product but i would look for something else
customer_reviews.author: Homer

customer_reviews.title: Metal Flakes Off It - Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because it is advertised as "diswasher safe" and "stainless steel". Straight out of the package I washed it by hand and the metal is flaking off. I do not feel safe to use it even one time. When I looked up return policy on this item -- I cannot return it. I will be throwing it in garbage soon. It is too bad people produce things that must immediately take up space in the landfill.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Polan

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy tenderizer
customer_reviews.text: Good solid tenderizer. Made short work of chicken breasts that I was pounding flat for chicken piccata.
customer_reviews.author: Scott P.

customer_reviews.title: Best Ever Meat Mallet!
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautifully balanced mallet! I have used it on both chicken and beef and it performs very well. Also, have sent it through the dishwasher and it comes out like new. I have purchased other mallets from different companies but this one is the best!
customer_reviews.author: Joan H.

customer_reviews.title: High Quality
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely fantastic! Looks slick, feels great in the hand and works wonderfully. Highly recommended. Cave Tools had great high quality products.
customer_reviews.author: Amy M.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Mallet
customer_reviews.text: I bought this tool for two reasons, pounding meat and crushing ice cubes. The mallet has great balance for maximum striking ability, and is the perfect size for both reasons of purchase. A quality tool addition to any kitchen!
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!! Should of bought earlier!!
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t used it on meat yet. Lol works great breaking ice & smashing garlic cloves. Easy to clean. Anna
customer_reviews.author: Anna Heineken

customer_reviews.title: It appears to be of great quality and I'm sure she will love it
customer_reviews.text: “Bought this for my daughter-in-law to go in her basket of gifts for Birthday.she's the cook at our house, haven't given it to her yet. It appears to be of great quality and I'm sure she will love it."
customer_reviews.author: Fla Girl

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good choice, makes meat much more tender..good size and good quality..
customer_reviews.author: lily

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!!
customer_reviews.text: Way better then the average! Stainless steel, high quality, heavy duty and works amazing!
customer_reviews.author: AZ Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I use this to take all my meat to pound town. 10/10.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. B

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because it weighs in at one pound & has a long handle for leverage. Cheaper brands are light weight & do not smash meat without considerable effort.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Laughlin

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Replaced my very old aluminum meat mallet with this one. The weight is good and it is well made/sturdy. I pound a lot of different meats and so far have used this mallet on chicken, pork and beef with great results.
customer_reviews.author: Mary C

customer_reviews.title: Definite step up from my old tenderizer
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy meat tenderizer. Cleans up well in the dishwasher, as advertised. Good value.
customer_reviews.author: South Austin Girl

customer_reviews.title: Nice & light
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding implement! And, it's a dream because it is dishwasher safe! Nice & light...but it really does the trick!
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Rare to find this tool DISHWASHER SAFE :)
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for the fiance' after I destroyed his other one by putting it in the dish washer. Nice quality, he likes it a lot. He's forgiven me for the casualty.
customer_reviews.author: Jonesie

customer_reviews.title: I use it pretty regularly with the force of a guy who usually ...
customer_reviews.text: Quality product at a decent price. I use it pretty regularly with the force of a guy who usually swings a sledge and its holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: Shane

customer_reviews.title: Many uses and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Love how easy this washes in the dishwasher. My husband uses it to make awesome chicken cutlets. He said it's a great weight and gets the job done quickly without a ton of pounding. I used it to mash up ice, Cheerios, nuts, crackers, etc. it works so well my 60 yr old mother loved it and asked for one.
customer_reviews.author: cgal1007

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding quality
customer_reviews.text: Superbly well made. Ergonomic. High polish finish makes for easy (sanitary) clean-up. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: etpssi

customer_reviews.title: Well made and sturdy. I haven't personally used it but I know ...
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my boyfriend and he loves it! Well made and sturdy. I haven't personally used it but I know he was very happy about this product.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Great item - no more chewing up meat with sharp spikes!
customer_reviews.text: The rounded spikes on this little guy are amazing. No more chewing up the meat. I love using it. Nice and heavy, does a fabulous job, dishwasher safe - - what's not to love?
customer_reviews.author: Brechie

customer_reviews.title: Works better than my old one
customer_reviews.text: I just used it to break up frozen shredded cheese I forgot to get out of the freezer. Worked great!
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Cole

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT! Appearance, Weight, Quality Feel, Can' Wait To Ue It!
customer_reviews.text: “Very happy with the mallet. Appearance is excellent; weight is comfortable to handle and I like the fact that it is DISHWASHER SAFE. Excellent price, as well."
customer_reviews.author: Mark S. Wolin

customer_reviews.title: Breaks after few uses
customer_reviews.text: The handle get's lose from the base within few uses. Poor design.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Quest

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I love how easy it is to use. And also can be washed easily.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen hand

customer_reviews.title: BAM... Flat is where it's at.
customer_reviews.text: Best dishwasher safe mallet on the market. All stainless steel with a heavy head. Chicken, veal, beef, pork, fish, concrete doesn't stand a chance. This is the one to buy.
customer_reviews.author: DougChoz

customer_reviews.title: I love this mallet!!
customer_reviews.text: This meat mallet is made so well! I love that I can wash it in the dishwasher! Such a nicely weighted mallet and its nice that you can hang it up!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great tenderizing mallet! Used it immediately on some veal for weinershnitzel.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Hodge

customer_reviews.title: Superior quality and great price
customer_reviews.text: Superior quality of most others in this price range. Has a good balance and weight. Does an excellent job on the meats. I highly recommend this meat tenderizer mallet.
customer_reviews.author: Gary S

customer_reviews.title: So easy to handle.
customer_reviews.text: “ Is much easier for me to handle that the round disk tenderizer with the vertical handle sticking out of the top of the disk. This hammer requires much less effort on my part and my 77-year old arm doesn't have to work so hard! Get it! "
customer_reviews.author: Carol A.

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Works well love the flat side for chicken and pork chops the handle is also thick enough I don't feel like I'm holing a pencil

customer_reviews.title: Very Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used it yet. But I like that it is very sturdy. I saw others that were ok. But this one is exactly what I needed. And I like that it can be put in the dish washer

customer_reviews.title: Really nice
customer_reviews.text: Feels well built and has a good weight to it.
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: This is the best meat tenderizer I've ever used. The weight is perfect. I hand wash it even though it's dishwasher safe and it's easy to clean. It's good looking too.
customer_reviews.author: Ilovekittycats

customer_reviews.title: Beat your meat like a pro!
customer_reviews.text: It works well, has a good weight, and is easy to clean up. And everyone knows you want easy cleanup after beating your meat!!!
customer_reviews.author: Camille

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tool
customer_reviews.text: An excellent tenderizer hammer. It's heavy and has a nice long handle. You can tenderize or flatten chicken breast very quickly with this tool

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Tenterizer
customer_reviews.text: This tenederizer is easy to use and clean. I tried it the first night and it worked awesom.

product_meta.title: Meat Tenderizer Mallet Tool - DISHWASHER SAFE - Manual Hammer Pounder For Tenderizing Chicken Steak Pork & Veal in Kitchen - Professional Non Slip Silicone Handle for Pounding
feature_bullets: THE SECRET BEHIND THE BEST CHEF RECIPES such as country fried steak, weiner schnitzel and cordon bleu- Meat tenderizer mallet is perfect for pounding chicken, steak, beef, and other tough cuts of meat
DISHWASHER SAFE STAINLESS STEEL DESIGN saves tons of time cleaning up and safely sterilizes any raw meat bacteria left behind.
ALSO USE TO CRUSH NUTS, ICE & HARD CANDY WITH EASE - Your meat tenderizer mallet is not just for manual pounding meat. You will find tons of additional uses around the kitchen
COMES WITH 25 PROFESSIONAL RECIPES - step by step instructions and detailed tutorial videos are great for the family
LIFETIME SATISFACTION GUARANTEE - If at any point you are unhappy with your meat tenderizer mallet you can return it for a full money back refund. We Take Customer Service That Seriously
